This creature's power is equal to your devotion to black, and his toughness is equal to your devotion to white. [i](Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black. Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)[/i]
Creatures you control with finality counters on them get +1/+1 for each unique counter on them.
